subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Abdi Abdirahman is a favorite to make the United States Olympic team in the marathon, but the 30-year-old Somalian immigrant sprung from the humblest of athletic origins.
snippet: Abdi Abdirahman is a favorite to make the United States Olympic team in the marathon, but the 30-year-old Somalian immigrant sprung from the humblest of athletic origins.
